subject: RE: [junit] How to test private methods in a class.
msgSnippet: ... I agree. I d want to add, though, that I also value testable code, not only because I can write tests for it, but because it also tends to be well
messageBody:
> I value testing, so I generally do whatever it takes to make code
> testable. Not everyone values testing as much I do, especially
> compared to other considerations, so they do other things.

I agree. I'd want to add, though, that I also value testable code, not only
because I can write tests for it, but because it also tends to be well
decoupled code.

Cheers, Ilja
